settings.heading: What types of payments do you accept?
settings.content: We provide all major Payment methods including any credit or debit card, issued by Mastercard, Visa, and American Express, Mobile Money Payments from MTN, Airtel, and Mpesa, and other payment methods like Paypal

settings.heading: Can I edit or cancel an order after it has been placed?
settings.content: Orders are processed as quickly as possible, and therefore, may not be able to be changed once they are placed. If you do need to modify or cancel an order, please call us as quickly as possible.

settings.heading: Do you offer weekend delivery?
settings.content: YES !  You are welcome to shop at dashBuy any day of the week.

settings.heading: How do I exchange an item?
settings.content: Complete our return and refund form after that  send the product back to usâ€”then order the new item. We will process your return as soon as possible after receiving the returned item, for more information please visit our return and refund policy

settings.heading: Who has access to my personal information and address when I register to DashBuy?
settings.content: Dashbuy takes your privacy very seriously and only an authorized dashbuy personnel that handles orders can access that information. For more information checkout our privacy policy.

settings.heading: What is the process for ordering a product on Dashbuy?
settings.content: If you are interested in purchasing our products. You can either order it through our website or make the order through our contact center. When ordering through the website, you add the product to your cart and proceed to checkout where you will be asked for shipping and billing information, after that you can complete the order, then shortly our agent will contact you to confirm your order and address.

settings.heading: If I shop my products from Dashbuy, what is the delivery duration ?
settings.content: An estimated delivery time will be provided to you once you're placing the order. Delivery times are estimates and commence from the date of order. Delivery times are to be used as a guide only and are subject to the acceptance and approval of your order. For more information please check out the delivery policy. /*link*/

settings.heading: Are there other charges that will be paid besides the price of the product?
settings.content: The total price during the price of the product, includes the total price of all the products in the cart and the delivery fee.

settings.heading: After shopping online, what confirms that I will receive my products?
settings.content: After completing payment, you will receive a notification confirming your order with an Order code to track the progress of your order, that information will also be provided to you via email or phone number.

settings.descr_text:
DASHBUY is the Rwandaâ€™s most fashionable and trendiest online store, offering a wide range of top quality local and international commodities.

DASHBUY is a new and exciting product designed to offer a hustle-free shopping experience.

settings.paragraph_text:
We inspire shoppers through fashions, technologies, health, sports and entertainment, with an easy-to-use, highly secure shopping web portal, backed-up by safe e-payment platforms, and a quick delivery system.

Visit us today at DASHBUY head office located at CHIC Building #room E032C . This is where you will find our samples and models showroom. A place where samples are photographed in the studio and new products are loaded on the DASHBUY site daily. A place where our fashion and stockiest work around the clock to bring you online displays of NEW ARRIVALS, discount and promotional campaigns. A place where you will meet our customer service team, ready to take details of your order, respond to your emails and take your calls
